name: NSPanGestureRecognizer
desc: A continuous gesture recognizer for panning gestures.

items.name: var buttonMask: Int
items.desc: A bit mask of the button (or buttons) required to recognize this gesture.

items.name: var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of necessary touches on a Touch Bar for the gesture recognizer to match.

items.name: func translation(in: NSView?) -> NSPoint
items.desc: The distance traveled by the mouse during the gesture.

items.name: func setTranslation(NSPoint, in: NSView?)
items.desc: Changes the current translation value of the gesture recognizer.

items.name: func velocity(in: NSView?) -> NSPoint
items.desc: The velocity of the pan, measured in points per second.
